<h1 align="center">
  Getting Started With Gatsby
</h1>

## Install and Run your first Gatsby site

```bash
$ npm install -g gatsby-cli
$ gatsby new my-site
$ cd my-site
$ gatsby develop
```

Your site will be running at [localhost:8000][gatsby-site]

[gatsby-site]: http://localhost:8000
